detectors.description:
Reentrancy in ShareholderVomer.fallback() (ShareholderVomer.sol#439-487):
	External calls:
	- VMR_Token.transfer(msg.sender,reward.wmul(VMR_ETH_RATE)) (ShareholderVomer.sol#478)
	External calls sending eth:
	- ref.transfer(msg.value.mul(25).div(100)) (ShareholderVomer.sol#460)
	- owner.transfer(msg.value.mul(5).div(100)) (ShareholderVomer.sol#461)
	- owner.transfer(msg.value.mul(30).div(100)) (ShareholderVomer.sol#463)
	- payableUser.transfer(reward) (ShareholderVomer.sol#476)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- data.lastDatetime = block.timestamp (ShareholderVomer.sol#484)
	- data.funds = data.funds.add(msg.value.mul(70).div(100)) (ShareholderVomer.sol#485)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [ShareholderVomer.fallback()](ShareholderVomer.sol#L439-L487):
	External calls:
	- [VMR_Token.transfer(msg.sender,reward.wmul(VMR_ETH_RATE))](ShareholderVomer.sol#L478)
	External calls sending eth:
	- [ref.transfer(msg.value.mul(25).div(100))](ShareholderVomer.sol#L460)
	- [owner.transfer(msg.value.mul(5).div(100))](ShareholderVomer.sol#L461)
	- [owner.transfer(msg.value.mul(30).div(100))](ShareholderVomer.sol#L463)
	- [payableUser.transfer(reward)](ShareholderVomer.sol#L476)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [data.lastDatetime = block.timestamp](ShareholderVomer.sol#L484)
	- [data.funds = data.funds.add(msg.value.mul(70).div(100))](ShareholderVomer.sol#L485)
